Client.Name: ePublishing
Client.Role: Storage provider filling out application on behalf of the data owner

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: ePublishing is an integrated modern media tech stack driving revenue, improving productivity, and increasing engagement for publishers of content and data. They streamline editorial and audience workflows, amplify content delivery, diversify and grow revenue, and leverage a unified, data-first publishing ecosystem.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The data being stored are the archives and historical editorial and images from media companies - from daily newspapers to monthly magazines - that may reach back as far as 100 years.
